reviews_data.review_text: First time visiting.  The service was superb!  Some kind person anonymously paid for our coffee!  Thank you so much!!

Catawba Coffee Co. is a true gem in Mount Holly! The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, making it the perfect spot to relax or catch up with friends. The variety of coffee flavors is impressive, and each cup is perfectly brewed. The staff are incredibly friendly and remember the little details, making every visit feel personal. The pastries are fresh and delicious--definitely worth trying! I love supporting a local coffee shop that truly cares about its customers. Highly recommend stopping by if you're in the area!
Cozy little coffee shop in Mount Holly. A great way to enjoy the vibe and get away from homogeneous chains while supporting independents.
Very friendly staff and atmosphere. Love the wide variety of coffee flavors -- they are always delicious! Also, the pastries are amazing.

What a great place to get coffee and pastries. Coffee is always great! I go here a couple times a week and the owners and staff really know how to make you feel at home. I look forward to my coffee shop conversations a couple times a week. We are lucky to have such an awesome business in downtown!

Some of the logistics: plenty of parking, plenty of outlets, plenty of desk space and great music.
My favorite place to get coffee before picking my son up at school. Everyone is super friendly that works there, remembers my name and drink. Go above and beyond for customers.
Guests of the town and came across this cute coffee shop! The overall experience was great; friendly and knowledgeable staff and great drinks!!! 10 out of 10 would recommend.
Love their latte flavor options! The banana bread latte is so good.
Best Coffee around Skinny dirty chai frappuccinos w almond milk!!! My Favorite

A hidden gem in Mount Holly, and an easy drive from Charlotte. This coffee shop has absolutely exceeded our expectations! The coffee is delicious and the atmosphere is super cozy! Whether you're meeting up with friends, going on a coffee date, or reading/studying, this place is perfect! They also have really fresh baked goods & bring in seasonal flavors. The buttery pumpkin latte is a must for the fall!

Catawba Coffee in Mount Holly has become one of my favorite coffee shops! The staff is always friendly and welcoming. Not to mention how delicious the coffee and baked goods are. If you are in Mt. Holly you have to stop by you won't be disappointed
Great local coffee shop!
Lovely coffee shop with great customer service and amazing coffee. The inside is very cozy & welcoming.
Excellent quality coffee. Right next door to an independent bookseller. Very convenient  delicious pastries and a nice place to unwind
Visiting from Texas. This gem is worth looking for. The coffe and blueberry muffins were amazing! The atmosphere is welcoming. A good place to just sit and relax.

I live in Charlotte by been doing a job in Mount Holly for the last 2 weeks. Been having my coffee there every morning on the second day the lady remembered exactly what I wanted. And after that I was just walking the door and she would start making the coffee. Great price, the staff is amazing, and a great cup of coffee. The macaroons are great too you just have to get there early to get them.

This is a cute shop, but we were disappointed in our drinks. The drink orders were not wrong, and the coffee bean tasted fine, but the barista on steaming needs much more training. I could hear from across the room as we were waiting for the drinks that they was not steaming the milk correctly or long enough. Everyone's milk had no froth, and was just warm enough to drink. Definitely not even 145 degrees. Train the barista's to make everything correctly and to hold each other accountable. We be paying too much for coffee these days to be served mediocre drinks.
Best place in the area to get coffee or tea! Service and atmosphere are great. 100% recommend

I visited for the first time yesterday (7/8) at around 11:10. I didn't catch the name of the girl that helped me, but she was amazing. She explained the menu and made good recommendations. The drink she made was also fantastic. If you're ever nearby, please check this place out!
Awesome little coffee shop! They have a lot of sugar free syrup options which is hard to find and the coffee is delicious - not to mention the workers are super kind.
Did the honey bee iced coffee suggested by the owner. It was delicious.
Beautiful spot
Perfect little coffee shop in Mt Holly. Great atmosphere for work or meeting with friends. All there specialty drinks are amazing

Everything you want in a locally owned coffee shop.  I've been coming to them since they first opened they've always had fantastic coffee on top of great service.  The owners seem to love what they do and getting to know everyone.

I can't speak more highly of this place, the owners, and their product.
Good coffee, friendly staff.
Delightful Spot
Sweet shop, great coffee flavors and yummy muffins and scones. Nice place to sit and work awhile. Outlets for your computer etc. and a very friendly staff! Seating outside too
Amazing drinks and amazing owners!! Everyone is always so friendly!

Absolutely the sweetest people ever! I stopped in for a quick rest and bite to eat before a meeting, and they literally made me feel like family. Delicious food, delicious coffee, and the most welcoming, kindest people. Made my day eating here. I'll definitely be back!
Best coffee shop in town! They are close to our office, and we love going there every morning for the coffee! Thank you so much for your great coffee and hospitality.

It's the only espresso in the area.
But that's about all there is to say about it.

When they make coffee that doesn't taste burnt, get ceramic mugs, and learn latte art, maybe it will be a destination to look forward to. It is a cute little place in the downtown of Mnt Holly.

Charlotte's Best-Kept Coffee Secret: Catawba Coffee Co.

Craving a coffee experience that feels like home? Let me spill the beans on Charlotte's hidden gem...

Looking for a coffee spot that feels like your living room? Look no further than Catawba Coffee Co. I stumbled upon this cozy joint in Mt. Holly during my travels in Charlotte, and it's been my go-to for the past two weeks.

Here's the scoop: killer coffee, killer playlists, and killer pastries--all at prices that will make you smile. Plus, if you're in need of a workspace, they've got you covered with plenty of outlets and desks.

But what really sets this place apart is the vibe. It's like Cheers, but with coffee. Everyone knows each other, and the owners and staff treat you like family. Seriously... I've never experienced customer service this good.

And here's the kicker: it's worth the drive. Whether you're coming from Belmont, the airport, or anywhere in Charlotte, trust me, it's worth it. I've traveled the country for work and stopped in my fair share of coffee shops, but if I could take one back home with me, this would be it.

So, what are you waiting for? Swing by Catawba Coffee Co. and join the family.

You won't regret it!

Delicious! Was in the area and saw this small coffee shop with great reviews and they weren't kidding. The lady at the counter was so kind and helpful! Wish I had asked for her name. She was the sweetest. She recommended the Nutella flavor for my frozen coffee and it is so delicious. I also snagged a huge danish the size of my entire hand and it is also delicious. Sadly I'm not local so I won't be able to visit every day but if I'm ever nearby I will be sure to stop by. 5 Stars!
Great location in Mt. Holly and just 10 minutes from CLT airport. The lattes are great. Plenty of parking and seating. Friendly, quick service.

I've historically had good coffee here; however, the last time I came in, I asked for straight black coffee, reinstated that I wanted black coffee after being told of a flavored roast, and was given this odd, caramel-flavored black coffee. Hopefully it was just a fluke; Catawba is my go-to coffee in West Charlotte.

Cute little coffee shop with lots of seating and delicious treats!

I got my usual latte- which was very well made and delicious!

The PB chocolate frappe caught my eye as did the delicious looking muffins which I'll have to try next time.

I love the decor and vibes of this place.

You can sit outside or in one of the two rooms they have inside.
It would be a great place to get some work or some reading done.

I'll definitely be back and recommend that you try it out!
love this coffee shop. coffee is great!

Great service and small town feel. Unfortunately, I have to mention a couple negatives and I wish I wouldn't have to since this is the only true coffee shop in Mount Holly. The physical marketing of this place lacks, you could barely tell this id a coffee shop from the outside. I am guessing their revenue comes mostly from the locals that know. Lastly, and most regrettably,  the coffee used to make lattes, not sure if that's their main blend, I believe it to me Guatemalan coffee, tasted just like mean mug coffee co, and in my opinion just doesn't have a good taste. Wish these things will change as they are very conveniently located and the service is amazing.

Walked in for a urge of some kind of coffee normally get like a vanilla bean Bass pro what he thought I should do for another coffee kick he said add a shot of espresso so that's when we went with It was pretty damn good I'll probably start getting that from now on The shot of expresso is  exactly what I wanted

My only go-to place for coffee and good company. Catawba Coffee is the definition of hometown, neighborhood, local business. Great pastries. Quality hand crafted drinks combined with a quaint cozy atmosphere in the shop. Staff is a friendly crew no matter the time of day or who's on duty at the time. 10 out of 10 recommend Catawba Coffee.  Bring a friend and hangout or grab a quick cup on your way through Mount Holly.  You will not be disappointed
Good little coffee shop.

I was so delighted to find such a quaint little neighborhood coffeeshop near my house, and I really wanted to love this place, but STYROFOAM CUPS?!? Really?? I was hoping that they'd offer mugs instead of takeaway cups, but their only options are Styrofoam cups. I'd rather not be poisoned with microplastics while drinking my coffee or contribute to Styrofoam in landfill waste (it can take up to 500 years to decompose!) so I will not be coming here again and I cannot recommend it to others.
Great people, friendly and comfortable atmosphere and obviously great coffee! Highly recommend!
Love this coffee shop. Best service and the baristas are always so friendly and kind. Very cozy vibes.

This is hands down my go-to coffee shop! It has an old-timey town feel and garage doors for windows. The staff are super friendly and accommodating. Their drinks include everything from original lattes to smoothies. Perfect spot to sit on the couch for a date with your girlfriend or read a book, to work at a table, or play on their tick-tac-toe board with a family member or friend. Only area for improvement would be a larger food selection, but I love their sticky buns.  Highly recommend.

My Favorite spot for a nice treat. Service is always timely/friendly. The atmosphere is always cozy and the drinks and food items are THE BEST! I Often stop for my usual scones and today tried the London Fog! It stopped me in my tracks to turn and acknowledge once again how delicious it was. Thanks for creating such a special space to relax and enjoy a sweet quiet moment.

Ordered hot chocolate here before the annual Mount Holly lantern parade, it was very good. The place is located near the main street of Mount Holly, so there are many walkable interesting places around this coffee shop. The place is quite small and it may be not too comfortable to sit around for long, but the drinks are excellent. The staff is very friendly and they serve your drinks with happiness- unlike many others who just serve you robotically.

Parking is nearby and there are lots of spaces to park. They have a restroom for the customers.
Nice barista and great Chai Latte! The place is cozy, great place to get some online work done.
Just a really nice vibe. Feels like Seattle . Loved the coffee!
The staff was really kind and offered to bring me my drink if they weren't busy. Good atmosphere with good music. Honestly a bright point in a dark weekend, and good place to get work done!
Love this coffee shop! My favorite coffee in the area. The owner, Irene, is so kind and friendly. I highly recommend this shop!

Best coffee in the area. We have been here several times and each time the coffee has been wonderful. It is really flavorful and this is before you add any syrups. They also have a large selection of sugar free syrups. The fresh muffins are super tasty. The owner, Irene, is really friendly and makes a point to talk to you even when they are busy.

So it was me and my friends first time in .. and the place is cute so we're looking around like Aw this is cute and then about to order and the lady behind the counter glances at us rudely and then turns and begins doing something else .. she then keeps eyeing us annoyed even though she KNOWS we are trying to order lmao . And then she finally stops what she is doing . Mind you didn't say what can I get you . No greeting no words lol. So finally I just ordered and I'm like I'll take a ice latte caramel please with 4 sugar and she's like YOU CAN PUT THAT IN YOURSELF OUT THERE.. I was like ok ... thats fine . Most coffee spots I go to put it in but anyways lmao like WTH is all the rudeness and being cut off like that for ?? Esci when it wasn't even busy.. no one I mean no one was in there .. then .. afterwards I tasted the coffee and it was watered down and no espresso just milk and watered down. She clearly can't make a coffee to save her life either . So maybe that's why she was so pressed. Anyways won't be back . Got racist vibes from that shop & lady.
ALL AROUND DELICIOUS and super cute! Owners were so nice and make awesome espresso drinks

Catawba Coffee is always a great experience! They have a lot of options and are always really nice. Sarah took care of us today and she was really nice and got our order completed fast. Highly recommend.

Stopped in while I was in the neighborhood and I'm so glad I did! Sarah and Irene were super friendly and helpful, and really just kickstarted my morning in a super positive way. I got the "Bad Wolf" and it was delicious. I'm definitely looking forward to making it a routine stop whenever I am in the area.
Definitely take the time to stop in here. Friendly people and great coffee.

Joe and Irene have always a wonderful established coffee shop! Have been enjoying years, highly recommend, and will continue to have coffee with friends at Catawba Coffee! This place is a best place to visit !!

Their chai lattes are the best I've ever had. I'm from Florida so I make a point to go every visit. Irene's chai doesn't meet the bar, it is the bar. It is the standard that I compare every chai latte to. I haven't found anything close at home. We had an iced & a hot chai latte w/ almond milk

Easy 4 stars... Stopped by around 930am.  Solid establishment.  Will be back.  I got the Loch Ness Mocha - chocolate, Irish cream, a hint of cinnamon.  Awesome!  Not too sweet either...  Also an apple cinnamon muffin with cream cheese in the middle...   Not only was it huge, it was wonderful!  My 16yo girl got the Nutella Latte.  She said it was just alright but she don't know coffee either...  She did love her chocolate muffin with cream cheese.  Live music on the sidewalk just outside.  Great atmosphere!!  Wait staff were fast, efficient, and polite.  Were  there about 25min and there was always a line!  Stop by when you are ready to upgrade from the mermaid!
Very good baristas, kind and efficient, we were there on a Saturday afternoon and it was not too crowded. We had the smoothie and chai tea, both were very good.

My family and I went there on a Saturday and it was awesome. The coffee menu is great and the food delicious but the owners are the best part of this coffee shop! Extremely nice and involved, they love their clients and remember them by name. That's not the kind of service you get everywhere!

The staff was super friendly and appreciative! They thanked us for choosing their coffee shop. The shop is a freedom-loving establishment, and it has a very warm environment. Their coffee is good too, especially their Banana Bread specialty drink!
Always a great place to grab a coffee or specialty beverage!!!  Staff is very friendly and the atmosphere is awesome!!!
Awesome WiFi and drink spot. Highly recommend the chai frappe.
Great coffee and the muffins are too
Great local coffee. Try the dirty chai.
I got the chai tea latte and it was so good! Honestly better than Starbucks!
The banana bread latte is probably the best coffee I've ever had! The staff are very friendly and the coffee shop is super cute. I will be back! (:
Coffee and baked goods are fantastic! Good humans!
Very nice and cozy place. The coffee is good too. The staff is really nice and helpful.
Best coffee around, great service and good atmosphere. Give them a try you will enjoy.
Love going here the teas and coffee are the best Irene the owner is always so friendly and this place has a great vibe its also very clean including the bathroom
Great. I got a cold banana bread coffee. It was soooo good. Reasonable price.
I visited for the first time yesterday and loved the atmosphere. The drinks are just as good with neat flavors. Definitely plan on going again.

I liked it ok
Nice home town atmosphere
Ordered based on past review recommendations but wasn't really overwhelmed
Certainly not crossing it off my go to list but hope future visits will change my opinion
Cozy spot
Ok
stopped in for a few hours to work and staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Brought home some cookies from the register/ display area...  Very good!!
Super friendly staff. Great baked goods and coffee
Great coffee, friendly staff, and enjoyable place to sit or walk around town.
Best Chai Latte around! Love it!

Charming local Coffee Co located in the heart of Mt Holly. They have several different offerings of coffee and chai, along with some bakery goods that will accompany your dose of caffeine. Lots of comfortable places in the store to sit and enjoy your cuppa.
Great coffee and super friendly staff. They play a great mix of 80's music, which I love. The doughnut truck makes a regular visit as well.
Incredibly friendly service with a smile!  I'll def be back when I'm in the area.  The espresso was great too

I stopped in to Carawba Coffee for a hot chocolate. I was greeted promptly with a smile. As stated my hot chocolate was hot and chocolaty with whipped cream topping. It was an hour before closing and I had some work to do. I asked the batista if she was closing early and if she needed me to leave. With a smile she said they stay open until closing time.
Very cute place and accommodating staff!

Starbucks could never...
I've been going here for more than five years and I don't even live in the town any more! Catawba coffee opened in one spot on main street and has since been able to move to a larger spot around the corner. The atmosphere is charming and cozy. The service is always polite and prompt. The drinks are creative and delicious! To top it off, the owner is such a sweetheart, I'm always touched when I come home for the holidays and she still remembers me. Go for the coffee, the culture, all of it!

There just is no other coffee shop for us!  We love Irene and Joe and all the great baristas that serve our community of Mount Holly.  Friendly faces, great conversations and deliciously crafted coffees a-plenty at Catawba Coffee.  Great selection of baked goods too!  HIGHLY Recommend!
I love this place. It is close by with friendly service. I enjoy the selection of various plant milk (coconut, soy, almond) as well as a comfy environment.
Best Coffee shop around by far.
Not that great! To thick and weighed down , not balanced! Funky Stange Monkey with Oat Milk. The mango smoothie was also to over powering with Mango! Maybe sonthibg else would be better next time.

From the moment I walked in to the moment I left It was a great first time experience. Smiling faces, great conversation, atmosphere, coffee and muffin were awesome! Will definitely make this a regular stop going forward! Thank you Staff

Best Coffee around! My fiance and I go a few times a week. The staff is always extremely friendly, and Irene is one of the nicest people you will ever meet. My top two drinks are iced Birthday Cake with coconut flavoring added and Bad Wolf (it sounds weird but I definitely recommend it!)
Good seating, great coffee. Love the big couch/chair at the entrance. 4 stars instead of 5 due to the cups being styrofoam; get with the eco-friendly times, folks!

catawba coffee has the best coffee around the area. the coffee is never bitter, hot or iced, and they actually steep your tea instead of just throwing the bag in the cup. the staff is always super friendly & pays attention to requests for milk alternatives & syrup variations.

catawba also has a great atmosphere. the shop itself is straight out of a picture & cute as a button. and every time i'm in there i say "this is such a good song!" at least once.

10/10 recommend trying out catawba
Great little quaint shop with indoor and outdoor seating.  Friendly staff.  Good coffee
Looooove love love
Great little place for coffee. A good variety and friendly service.  Pretty quick in getting your order out.
Bypass Starbucks and try out Catawba Coffee!  Latte, scones and muffins were perfect!
Nicest owners. Friendly calm environment. Came in asked for a specialty drink and they nailed it.

Catawba Coffee has been my favorite coffee spot for years.  The owners and staff are always wonderful and the coffee is the best around!! No one else makes a caramel latte or caramel frappe like they do!!! The atmosphere is always great too!
Love the  coffee.  I had a Raspberry Mocha with whip cream

This coffee shop is my go to whether it be to have a little meeting or just to hang out and work alone. The coffee is always fantastic and the employees make anything I ask for. It's always a friendly atmosphere and I can't imagine going anywhere else!
Very comfortable environment with very friendly staff! Most importantly the coffee is great and the apple muffin is soooo good!!!

What a wonderful place to spend a day or just hang out for a bit to work or socialize. The owners and staff truly make you feel like family. The coffee, goodies, and the feeling of being so welcomed is above and beyond what anyone would expect. 5 Stars for sure.

Great atmosphere, great place to study or have a meeting as they're open long hours.
Their coffee is not that good, it's weak and has a nutty flavor. The service is also really slow - I feel like I see a new person working every time I go there, I don't know if they have trouble keeping employees or what but service could be faster if they kept experience around.
I love this place!! Best coffee I've ever had and it's family owned. Just can't beat it!
Welcoming atmosphere. Friendly staff, they remember their customers. Great selection and not to mention everything taste wonderful.
Good coffee.  This is in a different location than the place that was here a few years ago.  I almost missed it.
Irene makes the best coffee. Awesome place to relax and enjoy your daily pick me up.
This was a great coffee shop, glad I found it. Went twice it was so good.
Nice place

Super cute little shop in downtown Mount Holly with very reasonable prices. I loved walking the little downtown area sipping on the Americano that I ordered, and seeing a train pass by. I'll definitely be back soon!
Enjoyed the matcha latte + Tiramisu. Good atmosphere and service.

Me and my wife been wanting to try this place out. It's 5 minutes from our house in beautiful Mt Holly. I ordered the creme brulee frappe. My wife ordered the banana bread frappe. We also got a chocolate cheesecake muffin. The lady made the coffees fresh in front of us. Everything was very delicious and the staff was friendly and professional. We definitely will be back!
local and yummy treats
The Nutella mocha was delicious!
SO SO good. Great place to grab a unique and delicious cup of coffee and walk around shops.

I LOVE this coffee place so much. Extremely comfortable and cozy environment. I've tried almost all of their specialty drinks and they're all very flavorful and amazing. The drink I got today (which I drank a little bit of before I took a photo) was a PB Mocha Frappe. Very delicious.

I think my favorite thing to say about this place is definitely how accurate the descriptions of the drinks are. In every specialty drink I've tried, I could taste every flavor they listed on the menu without one being too overpowering. The employees really know what they're doing. Would also say very reasonable price for the drinks. $4.25 for a very enjoyable and high quality coffee is absolutely worth it to me.

Would recommend their cookies when they have them as well! Take a seat and finish some work, too, this place is perfect for just getting together with friends or studying for an exam.
Friendly staff, chill atmosphere, veteran friendly, amazing coffee at good prices.
This local coffee shop is delightful! Eclectic decor, groovy, friendly people, strong wifi signal and delicious local coffee.
Coffee is good, prices are good and they usually have a decent selection of food items. Service is always great and staff friendly. Plenty of room to sit and chat or get some work done too
First time here stood at the counter for 15 minutes not even a hello or be acknowledged that I would be waited on in a timely manner wow and still waiting
Vanilla lattes and pumpkin muffins are so good!

This coffee shop feels like home. I have experienced nothing but warmth and above & beyond customer service from every barista. The owner truly cares about her customers, and you can sense that care every time you enter the shop. The coffee is amazing too!!!
Displays made some excellent coffee that kept us energized and on the road.

the service was amazing and the people were very very friendly. I ordered a cinnamon bun latte with oatmilk and i ordered it extra sweet (which was extra, important later). when i got it it tasted bitter like regular coffee. and i was too shy to ask for it to be sweeter and possibly be charged more. so i added 5 packets of their sugar and it made it 20% better. My boyfriend got a cappuccino and said it tasted like woodchips. such an obscure thing to taste like. but it is what it is.
Tasty latte and a good muffin
Honestly the cutest Cafe i have ever been to with the sweetest staff. One of my fave places!

Always such an amazing experience every morning. The ladies always take care of us and know exactly what we want. This morning I got some thing a little different and it's by far the best coffee I've ever had in my life!!!
Great coffee!! The owners and staff are the best!
Love this place
Enjoyed a yummy Creme Brulee coffee and raspberry scone. So tasty!!  The names of the drinks and smoothies are intriguing. Will be back to taste test!!
Great coffee, snacks and smoothies. Relaxing and good prices. The staff are wearing masks, why can't the customers??? Seven people, not eating just talking, no masks on.
Go get a banana bread latte! It slaps! Not to mention the staff is amazing!
Awesome ambiance and great place. The coffee was delicious and so was mango smoothie.
Love this place and love the people there. Coffee is great!!

I have been meaning to leave a review for Catawba Coffee for a while... they are seriously the BEST! We moved to the area at the beginning of the year and having been coming just about every week since. It is such a calm and quaint shop, the employees are always kind and welcoming! My boyfriend has had his tried and true drink since the start and I have had fun trying different ones! My favorite has been the buttery pumpkin latte  I also really like the mocha lavender! Both drinks have the right amount of coffee/espresso, oat milk, and sweet for me! We also typically snag a muffin, scone or bagel while we're there! So yummy too 
All in all we love this shop and will always come back to support and get our coffee fix! If I could give them more than 5 stars I would.

If I could come here everyday I would. The coffee is amazing and they have so many flavor options and combinations! The whole staff is friendly and helpful, and I have actually become friends with them :) If you like bananas ORDER A BANANA BREAD LATTE!!!! It's the best latte in literally the whole world and it's just a 15 minute drive from my house. I love it here! They have garage doors on the front of the store that they open when the weather is nice and the vibes are unmatched. I would give 100 stars if I could!
Love this little place and the employees are wonderful!

The place is very nice and clean, but I could not get my sea salt and caramel coffee that I have been looking for ever since I had at another coffee shop. I ordered something else and the drink was good. I will be honest, as a coffee lover I am not into drinks with 8 ingredients and a shot of espresso, literally, but if you are fine with anything plus coffee, I recommend this place. But I would like to see more options with coffee as the star of the show .
Coffee is always delicious, and the service is consistently amazing and fast!

Absolutely love this coffee shop! My latte was perfect, staff was super friendly, and the shop aesthetic is open and inviting.

10/10 would recommend and WILL return!!
Great locally owned place, owners are very friendly

Best coffee spot in Mt. Holly!! I always have to stop here any time I am passing through the area, because their frozen almond milk chai is the best thing I have ever tasted !! The woman that owns the place is an absolute sweetheart, as well as everyone I have ever dealt with working there. Absolutely give this place a try, you won't be disappointed.
Enjoyed it every time I visit
Awesome staff
Such a great shop!  A great place to gather!
Delicious every time
the employees are so so sweet and the items are delicious! especially the tiramisu.
Really cool little spot. Very friendly batista.
First off the staff is beyond amazing here. Catawba Coffee is definitely the place to go. Great drinks and atmosphere.
Love it.
All staff wearing mask
The smoothie was the best one I have ever had! My only issue is many costumers had no masks on and no one was requiring them.

Best lattes on the planet! Super friendly staff that always remembers my name and order.
So thankful that this local establishment remained open during Covid!
Best coffee shop in Gaston County!!!!
People with no masks, coughing continuously- staff didnt say anything to them; and there was a hair in my macaroon. Visiting from out of town. Will never be back.
Amazing place

What a great spot! Absolutley delicious coffee and the atmosphere is very welcoming. The staff were very pleasant and helpful! If you're in the area and need a pick-me-up or you have some work that you need to do on the computer, this is a great place to be!
Delicious coffee and a great place to relax!
Just got a White chocolate mocha frappe and let me tell you. This is the absolute best coffee I've ever had, this place never disappoints. Will always recommend!!

this is my favorite spot to get coffee! my grandpa comes here almost every day for his coffee and for work meetings. sometimes i go here to study because it's quiet and there are nice big windows to look out of. they have some books to read and games to play. the shop is small, but there are enough seats for people as long as you don't come right at lunch time. their chai latte and london fog latte are my favorite drinks.
The best little coffee house around! The staff is nothing but smiles, and you'll enjoy the beautiful new location, with rustic garage doors serving as the windows. What a cool vibe indeed!

Always, Always a great place to collect a smile! This place has a variety of Hot and Cold Coffee selections and pastries. Seating both indoor and outdoor. Garage type doors on the nice days..very pleasant atmosphere. Always friendly,  Always smiling!!

Good first experience. Not sure what happened but my wife's coffee wasn't as hot as it should've been. We let them know and they took care of it and apologized. Interesting flavored lattes available. Will be visiting again soon!
Delicious lattes and yummy scones. Friendly staff and great service.
Super friendly staff. Hot chocolate for me, and just out of the oven chocolate chip cookies with three different kinds of chocolate chunks. I would just move in, if they were 24 hours! Lol
delicious coffee, but no masks. wish they would take this pandemic & the health of their customers seriously
Good coffee and atmosphere, but really disappointed  to see employees not wearing masks.

Very cute coffee shop and nice staff. My latte was only warm and a little too sweet for my liking. I was annoyed that only one of the workers was wearing a mask. They continued to serve customers who walked in not wearing a mask. I understand this is a small town but how can you expect your customers to follow the rules if your employees aren't even doing so.
Great place with friendly people.
Great Customer Service!!

If you are looking for a good cup of coffee or a place to work on schoolwork, please try this place!I've been here 3x and was impressed each visit. The employees are very friendly and are welcoming. They have an outstanding collection of beverages and baked goods. The frappe and iced lattes were delicious and the cheese danish was the best I ever had. I will definitely come back for many more visits.
Great place to grab a coffee and dessert. Love the employees. Owners are amazing people!!!!

Wow!  First time visiting Catawba Coffee Shop and it was amazing.  I got the Iced Chai Latte and it was the best one I have ever had. My son got a vanilla Frappuccino and enjoyed it. I will definitely be back next time I pass by.  I highly recommend stopping by and trying them out for yourself. Thanks for the great drink.
Great coffee!

I am very disappointed,  my daughter had a camp in Mount Holley so I googled coffee shop and their placed showed up.  I passed it up the first time it did not have a noticeable sign out front.  I ordered 2 mocha frappes and a frozen lemonade. The frozen lemonade tasted like watered down pineapple juice and both mocha frappes tasted like weak chocolate milkshakes. Very disappointed all of the drinks were thrown out. I wasted $14 here. I will not be going back.
Love how clean they keep the place. It gets cleaned and disinfected every time uses each table. great job.
People are friendly and coffee is good!
Great atmosphere, delicious coffee. I love the Loch Ness Mocha.
Nice spot with good coffee and local baked goods.
Very cool vibe and a great room for music!
Love the coffee and some of the guys are cute ;-)

This by far my favorite place to get coffee. The staff always treat you as one of the family. The the cozy friendly seating either at one of the tables or on the couch allows you to enjoy the loving community atmosphere. Great priced specialty drinks and baked goods will be a wonderful way to begin, break or even end your day. 5 stars does not begin to rate this awesome piece of heaven.
Great specialty lattes.

I have been to this coffee shop just last year and I enjoyed it very much.

It was an overall pleasant experience, the coffee was good, the art was lovely, it had a nice atmosphere.

I recommend coming down and checking out this place.
Catawba Coffee is a cute little hideaway coffee spot! Great for meetings or just hanging out with the girls before yoga!
Awesome, mixed coffee shop !!! Way to go.!!
Love this neighborhood coffee shop!

I have tried this place twice, and I love it. The barista was very friendly , and mentioned some of the events happening in Mt. Holly! The selection of craft drinks is great, the Nutella latte is a must!
So delicious! One of my favorite places to go!
We love these folks they are so warm and inviting and make a fantastic caramel frappe!!
Love love love and miss this place so much, Irene is the BEST
The coffee was wonderful and the people were friendly
Delish coffee, chill vibe, great atmosphere

We loved this coffee shop on a recent visit to Mt Holly. This visit was not in my plans but I am so happy I decided to visit.  We were in another shop when I overheard another customer mention her spiced cider. I asked her where she got it and she told me how good it was and the name of the shop. So I finished shopping and put it in the phone for directions and off we went. I highly recommend this coffee shop and plan to visit the cute little town of Mt Holly while you are there.. We were just heading there for the cider but spent time there checking out all the shops. The people there were so friendly and I will make sure to stop in on next visit to the area. I just wished I had known about this little hidden gem sooner!!! Make plans to visit Mt Holly soon!!
Everybody was so nice
Excellent Coffee, scones, tea and Superior Customer Service! Irene is the Best!!!
Had a PB/choco Frape while I heard great local music. Highly Reccomend
Bustling coffee house. A must try!
Great place to get a cup of coffee and hang out!
Cozy little coffee shop
Had the Pina Colada smoothie this week, delicious, plus was topped with whipped cream. I come here once a week and have never been disappointed.
This coffee shop is great!!
Great coffee, wonderful staff. A welcoming environment. Highly recommend!
We've been several times and LOVE it. By far the best coffee around. The staff is always super friendly too. Try their Nutella mocha, you won't be sorry. It's so delicious!!!
Delicious Smoothies
An excellent experience! Relaxed environment and friendly staff. Indoor and outdoor seating. A wide variety of drinks and use locally sourced goods. Definitely recommend!
Lugar muy ameno y uno de los pocos que permanece abierto despues de las 18 hs. Muy buena atencion y la opcion de sentarse afuera es muy recomendable.
Friendly atmosphere and great coffee at good prices
Awesome friends made at this place and if your new to the area or have never been you are missing out on a loving, friendly place to have coffee and make some great memories

Great place to grab coffee and a sweet snack. Staff is very friendly, plenty of seating, and drinks are delicious. Really love the Vanilla Carmel latte but the Birthday cake latte is also a fav. Parking out back is plentiful if the street is full (normally is). They offer free wifi as well.

Best Lattes ever!!! The friendliest, sweetest barista greets you as soon as enter her establishment! The blueberry muffins will literally change your life  They are that good!! Also they offer a coffee rewards card !! So every tenth coffee or latte is free!!
Really enjoyed this cozy coffee place in downtown Mt. Holly! Had a tall Americano that was excellent. The barista was very friendly and engaged in small talk with us. Will definitely be back!
Nice vibe. Flavorful brewed coffee. Nice singer/songwriter music piping in!
Great coffee. Great music
Great family friendly local spot !! Good coffee and pastries; tremendous owners & service!
Very cute cafe. The Chai Frappe was delicious! Love the support for local artists!
Excellent coffee drinks.  Special music listening room for regional singer songwriters.  Great cozy space.
Great little coffee shop
Nothing better than a cup of Jo and the Best people EVER!!!
Great coffee, service and a really nice atmosphere.  I'll definitely come back again!
Love the coffee and service!
LOVE this coffee shop. Best chai tea latte I've ever had.
Saw a friend play on a Friday night. Was a nice little spot for some good music.
Love this place.
Great coffee shop in downtown mount holly. Locally owned and operated. Friendly staff, and the owner makes a great cup. Small cafe with tables and lounge area,  as well as outside seating.
Warm atmosphere, great staff

6/2018:
I give their cappuccino a 4 star. The beans had a subtle blueberry hint to them. Quite nice.

UPDATE 12/2018:
Their espresso drinks consistently good. It's great having a local place to grab a table for a little while and enjoy chill vibes.
Today especially, they had a trio playing Christmas Carols on cello and someone was selling their wears - pretty festive and feels cozy.
Great little coffee shop with excellent service and amazing coffee.
The coffee was really good. I love that they have live music.
Friendly, comfortable gathering spot, great coffee and desserts, and fantastic acoustic singer songwriters every Friday and Saturday evening 7-9!

An Evaluation of Catawba Coffee Co.
Today people rely on caffeine, whether it is a business woman who needs a boost on a Monday morning or a college student writing an essay the night before it is due. A warm, and tasty option for caffeine is coffee, which may be brewed at home or bought at any number of fast food restaurants, but nothing can beat the brewed beverages of an accredited coffee shop. Coffee shops are such popular places to hang out, they are even featured on television, like in the sitcom Friends. Locally owned coffee shops are always nice places to visit, and Catawba Coffee Co. is no exception. Catawba Coffee is a pleasant place to be, it is a truly terrific coffee shop with nothing to complain about.
Catawba Coffee Co. has a wide variety of menu options. With drinks such as the Americano and the Zebra Mocha latte, their menu stretches from A to Z. At affordable price points, one could buy beverages in four sizes: short, tall, grande and extra large. While coffee is the most popular choice, non-caffeinated beverages are also an option. There are plenty of smoothies and hot teas to choose from, as well as hot chocolate. While enjoying a coffee one might think "I wish I had something to go with this", Catawba Coffee sells home-made muffins, danishes, brownies, cookies, and other sweet treats.
Sanitation is a top priority for anyone in the foodservice industry, and this is apparent at Catawba Coffee. They sweep, mop, and clean the tables every night so their customers won't walk in to a dirty store the next day. The manager cares very much about customer satisfaction. if someone gives the store a negative review she will reach out to them to get their feedback, so it won't be a recurring problem. The employees are also very friendly and are on a first name basis with most regular customers. They love their jobs and their attitudes reflect that.
When someone walks into Catawba Coffee they are greeted by a warm color scheme, soft lighting, a quiet song on the radio, and--obviously--the smell of fresh coffee. The creme walls, decorated with works from local artists, go well with the dark-red tile floor and the brown furniture. The string of lights and spotlights on the ceiling gives the shop plenty of light without being too harsh. When someone first gets to the counter and take a look at the hand-painted menu you may be overwhelmed by all the choices, but the barista will happily make a recommendation if you can't decide what you want.
Something else that makes Catawba Coffee a nice place to go to is all the things one can do there. There is a variety of board games if someone is there with a friend, and if one is there alone they could take a look at the bookshelf, filled with plenty of books to read. On Fridays, as well as the occasional Saturday, there is live acoustic music in the evenings and the shop fills with people by seven o'clock.
Catawba Coffee Co. is a great family-friendly coffee shop to visit, with a large enough variety that anyone can find something that he or she will like. It has dedicated and hard-working employees who love interacting with customers. From the moment you walk in to the moment you leave, you will feel comfortable and calm because of the warm, tranquil atmosphere.
Best value in E Gaston and NW Meck cty for great tasting coffee and specials.  They even have good music on announced Fri evenings!
Lovely experience and delicious coffee! The woman at the counter was so friendly, will definitely be back!
My favorite place to get coffee, the staff is awesome!

Mt Holly has a sparkling gem on Main Street .....Catawba Coffee has the best coffee, lattes, frappes that you have ever had the pleasure of drinking! As fantastic as their coffee is.......the icing on the cake or actually the whipped cream on the frappes... are the owners and the baristas who treat you like family. They really know your name and go the extra mile to make your drink just like you like it!  The atmosphere is warm and welcoming and a great place to meet and socialize!  If you haven't been to Catawba Coffee, I highly recommend that you stop bye, you will be glad you did!

Always friendly and the drinks are always spot on. Great family owned coffee shop. The owners treat everyone that walks in like family and are all around genuine people. Mount Holly is lucky to have this business here.
Service is slow and spotty. I can't wait for a competitor to open in town.

This little coffee shop has become one of my favorites! Irene and the staff here are always super friendly and welcoming. I am a black coffee man and Catawba's Coffee is great but lately I've been drinking the dirty chai and it's fantastic! The best I've had in the area and 100 times better than the big coffee chain! If you stumble across this review I hope you give Catawba a try!
I have been a barista for 11 years and I was very impressed with their coffee drinks! The owner was a gem! I loved the vibe and I will be coming back every day during my stay in Charlotte!
Great place  and great people  that own it.
Always a pleasure to visit Catawba Coffee.  Friday and Saturday nights catch the Songwriter's series.  Always great coffees and music.

Awesome local coffee shop that's better than any if the big chains like starbucks and Dunkin donuts. Coffee is relatively inexpensive unless you're getting a specialty drink like lattes but even then, it's less than a chain. They also have a rewards program with a punch card system for free coffee and specialty drinks. It's buy 10 of a respective type of drink and get one free. They also have some bakery items as well that look amazing. I've only tried their blueberry scone but it was really good. I'd definitely recommend this place if you're in the downtown Mount Holly area.

Catawba is a great spot to grab a coffee on the run or sit and savor a frappe while listening to music.  The barista is always willing to "jazzup" my order.  Tonight, we added pumpkin puree and spice and I had a pumpkin spice frappe.   Killer....insanely delicious..
Super friendly staff and great coffee.
Catawba offers a relaxed atmosphere as well as fast, friendly service.
